directions: Stir moscato wine, lemon-lime soda, brandy, peach schnapps, peaches, strawberries, mangos, pineapple chunks, and raspberries together in a large container and chill 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: 4 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles lemon-lime soda (such as Sprite®)
1/2 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
title: White Peachy Sangria
